snippet: After molding a 38-0 juggernaut that is two victories from a national championship, John Calipari was voted the Associated Press coach of the year.
abstract: Associated Press names Kentucky men's basketball coach John Calipari coach of the year; other college basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: After molding a 38-0 juggernaut that is two victories from a national championship, John Calipari was voted the Associated Press coach of the year.

headline.main: Calipari Is A.P. Coach of the Year
headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | College Basketball; Calipari Named Top Coach
